translations: n．订婚，婚约：承诺结婚的仪式或行为。
· The couple announced their espousals at the family gathering.
这对情侣在家庭聚会上宣布了他们的订婚。

sentences.sentence: God is saying to His people - you are not in love with me now, but I remember the time when you were - "I remember... the love of thine espousals."
sentences.translation: 神对祂的子民说-你们现在不爱我了，但我记得你们爱我的那段时间- “我记得你婚姻般的爱情”。

sentences.sentence: Go forth, o ye daughters of Zion, and behold king Solomon with the crown wherewith his mother crowned him in the day of his espousals, and in the day of the gladness of his heart.
sentences.translation: 锡安的众女子阿，你们出去观看所罗门王，头戴冠冕，是在他婚筵的日子，心中喜乐的时候，他母亲给他戴上的。

sentences.sentence: Go forth, o ye daughters of Zion, and behold king Solomon with the crown wherewith his mother crowned him in the day of his espousals, and in the day of the gladness of his heart.
sentences.translation: 锡安的众女子啊，你们出去观看所罗门王，头戴冠冕，就是在他婚筵的日子、心中喜乐的时候，他母亲给他戴上的。
